reviews.text:
It is a historical and iconic place in Bandung. It has art deco architecture style. It was constructed in 1895 as a dance hall, entertainment, and social gathering venue. It is a museum now. It was renamed "Gedung Merdeka" in early 1955 and chosen as the venue of Asian-African Conference.
Free ticket to enter this building.
You must see and find their Bandung Asia Africa history. It's only one place to meeting Asia Africa Delegation in the world. Let your mind enjoy them!

This place reminds us about black page of Human History - the Colonialism. Exposition includes the authentic hall and rooms decoration and great selection of photos. Guides, who are volunteering students are keen, friendly and knowledgeable.
The building is well maintained and preserved, it has souvenirs shop and clean wash rooms. It would be great, however, to add there a coffee shop.
Very clean and interesting. The smart local guides are provided there. All the sections inside are really clean, including the restrooms. Wow...
A must-visit place in Bandung. It's free yet a really nice place to learn the history of Bandung. We also get the chance to come inside the hall where the Asian African Conference was held.
Old fashioned hotel. But the room with king bed is spacious. Breakfast mostly Indonesian food. Location in the city centre, near the Asia Africa museum

One of my favorite hotel while staying in bandung is Prama Grand Preanger Bandung. 
Prama Grand Preanger feels like home. 

This hotel  which has a typical colonial style architectural style. Hotel located on Asia Afrika street no. 81 has been established since 1920.

Prama Grand Preanger has plenty of access to various tourism objects in the flower city such as trips to the train station (10 minutes), Husein Sastranegara Airport (15 minutes), just a short walk to the Asian square and Museum Africa. 

Check-in service can be said to be easy and fast so you can directly enter the room by chance we want two rooms that have connecting doors, the service is also friendly.

Their swimming pool are best, very clean and they have pool for kids also. 

Overall their service and hospitally was the main reason why we always comeback. 
Keep up the good work Prama Grand Preanger.

5star hotel. But consider old bulding and not really good maintained. Cleaning to be improved.

Location is perfect.
Perfect location, truly city centre. Good bfast, good hotel lobby, good staff. Historical renovated building but not the rooms. Old room, old matrass, dark shower chamber.
nice hotel, strategic location, 1-2 km from Braga street. recommended hotel

One of the oldest and historical mosque in Bandung area. The building has been renovated few times. There are spacious parking lot for cars and bikes. It's also strategically located.

This mosque brings nostalgic memory for me as I was used to go here after school time was over. There are also food stalls and mini market worth to try near the mosque.

You better put your shoes and flip-flops at the deposit counter to prevent from theft. And always watch your belonging.
One of the oldest mosque in bandung. I love the architecture and ambiance. So many streetfood in the front of mosque
Well I was accompany my friend  she was doing the prayer
A good place to face almighty god and pray

This is also my favorite place to refresh my mind and soul. Attaneding tausyiah from ustadz Abu Haidar every tuesday morning and saturday evening. 

Come and join the crowd.  Prepare for you akhirat. Coz dunya is only temporary and deceiving pleasure

It was good. The performance was simply captivating and lovely. I wish there hadn't so much bats flying around.. Kinda scared me. Can you guys do something about it? Although I bet it can't be helped since the roof is open. Keep it up.

One of my fave place to enjoy traditional and modern music. Great angklung show entertainment for the whole family. It has small merchandise shop as well. They give free ice complimentary for each guest. The toilets were unique with a back to nature theme

Awesome performance consisting of skillfull youth performer. They teach the guest how to play angklung and in the end they let the guest to play along with them. They do deserved a standing applause 🙌🏼

Don’t forget the souvenir shop outside, it’s really nice and affordable. Some of them even can read mandarin language and play Fast and Furious theme song using Angklung ❤️

Its a nice place in Bandung.
We can learn traditional music instrument names Angklung. Everybody can try and enjoy to play angklung, Special traditional music instrument from Indonesia.
Your performance was awesome! Like to come back again next time. It was memorable experience. Keep it up guys. Adistya nice MC 👍👍👍

One of the popular museum in Bandung. It shares mostly Sundanese culture and West Java history from stone age, middle age until now. This museum is well manage seen from its tidy appearance. Ticket cost around 3000-5000 idr
Recommend to remember all of history of west java
A good place to learn more about the history and culture of West Java province.
Nice collection. But digital media isn't being turned on. Maybe due to some error in the system?

put in ur list when u visit Bandung.
Interesting and very educative place .

As the name implies ... the atmosphere of the village with the lush foliage is very thick, but with a very beautiful and very natural environment.
The layout of the place and its lighting match the atmosphere of the place, very good for bringing family and relatives to marry the atmosphere. Taste of food is not too good, but can be replaced with a very beautiful place.

The place is really nice. A really fresh air comes from the mountain and the tree surrounding the restaurant. I give it 8 for the ambience. But maybe they can clean up the table or the lesehan place much cleaner. For the food is so so. Not really special. But for everyone of you looking for a nice quiet place with a really fresh air and have some kind of country side vibes.. I recommend this place.
Nice place to sit and relax. They sell a lot of traditional Indonesian food with relatively affordable price.

Off beaten road typical booth eating concept restaurant in some valley between hills. Cool but not chilly, with running waters on its side track. Small water falls at its rear, polluted with trash. Food is so so, price above indonesian average. Good for ambiance and to chill a little.
This Place has the great ambience with the nice temperature of Lembang, and a 'village sense', well the price is a bit high but i think its still worth

Food 4/5
Their nasi bebek is great. Crispy but not oily fried duck, serve with white rice. They have a lot of variant sambal. Good ingredients. Price is a little bit price though. Recommend Menu : Nasi Bebek Tegaunggah with Sambal Bawang

Ambience 5/5
Excellent ambience. Many seats for groups with great views. Easy wheelchair accessible.

Service 4/5
Good service. They serve welcome drink if you buy tickets to NuArt. Take a little bit time for drinks or food to come.
Breakfast..
Tempat yang nyaman untuk melepaskan lelah setelah berjalan jalan di galeri
Makanan ok, tapi sedikit dan harga agak diatas rata²

Diesen Cafè ist einen Standort mit NuArt Sculpture Park.
Schöne Aussicht.
Das Innere ist einzigartig.
Sauber Platz.
Die Luft ist frisch hier.

Eigentlich bin ich nicht daran interessiert, Ente zu Essen.
Ich habe mich dafür interssiert, Ente in diesem Cafè zu Essen.
Ich wähle immer knusprige Ente, Godhoh Biu, und hausgemachten Tee.
Der Geschmack von Essen ist schmackhaft.
Gut Bedienung.
Ich habe auch Bilder mit
Herrn Nyoman Nuarta gemacht.

This place brought so many good memories! I used to visit this classic old bakery/restaurant when I was a child with my grandfather. He loves to buy fresh load of bread as they bake it fresh in house according to German recipe.

The food is also really good. Many options available, especially for meat eater. 
They have great cakes too, freshly made in house, still following the old German recipe.

I hope they can maintain quality and recipe for years to come!
oldies and yummy cakes. you can also find various western food here. the ambience is cozy, suitable for families. the price quite high tho .. but worth the taste

The place is quite authentic yet lil bit spooky. Nice place.. But I gotta say no to the menu, I ordered banana split but I didn't expect it would be that creamy. Literally full of wipped cream. Big no. I also ordered baked potato, and it was, again, literally baked potato, no taste, no topping, nothing but potato. Baked.
Legendary. The food, the decoration, the ambience, flawless. My 8yo son loved playing the old piano in the corner while mom can just relax and enjoy the coffee.

Last time I went there for afternoon snacking, the service was very poor. We had to wait more than 15 minutes for order taking. And the cakes quality is pretty disappointing. Even though the environment is still cozy, but I will not recommend  Tizi anymore with that kind of service

They said their steak is the best and recomended! I completely disagree and disappointed. 
1. They can’t differentiate which one is medium and which one is medium well.
2. The mushroom and black paper sauce is terrible and they combined mayonnaise with salad on a steak! Give me a break!

However the people is very nice and polite, for the place is so so... it’s been a while since the last time I came to this restaurant. 
I wouldn’t come here again for the food!

Romantic place! Love it. Good food and private ambience. Live music is cool too. It is nice for a date. Especially during the dusk, you can also see a sunset above the Bandung city view. Foods are also tasty and the staffs are very friendly and helpful.
Amazing place to watch the sunset. Romantic and quiet, lots of privacy. The food is good, they have beers and smoothies. Would recommend!
Nice place, good food, and friendly staff... I enjoyed my time here, chat with friends while grab dinner...
Nice view, awesome taste, great musics! Never miss to come here whenever im in Bandung.. love from Malaysia!!

They said their steak is the best and recomended! I completely disagree and disappointed. 
1. They can’t differentiate which one is medium and which one is medium well.
2. The mushroom and black paper sauce is terrible and they combined mayonnaise with salad on a steak! Give me a break!

However the people is very nice and polite, for the place is so so... it’s been a while since the last time I came to this restaurant. 
I wouldn’t come here again for the food!

Romantic place! Love it. Good food and private ambience. Live music is cool too. It is nice for a date. Especially during the dusk, you can also see a sunset above the Bandung city view. Foods are also tasty and the staffs are very friendly and helpful.
Amazing place to watch the sunset. Romantic and quiet, lots of privacy. The food is good, they have beers and smoothies. Would recommend!
Nice place, good food, and friendly staff... I enjoyed my time here, chat with friends while grab dinner...
Nice view, awesome taste, great musics! Never miss to come here whenever im in Bandung.. love from Malaysia!!
Service was bad, but the food was awesome... especially if you like chili sauce (sambal) and "jeroan" like stomach, lymph, and intestines (babat, limpa, usus)
A lil bit delicious,  small parking area but we could use behind the building,  fast respond
This is our indonesian food especially from sundanesse food. We usually called sayur asem and ayam bakar
One of most authentic sundanese food. Try the spicy sambal. Will blow your mouth for sure...
One of the best Sundanese food I've ever tried. :)

Food is is nice here. Drinks are refillable. The decor is interesting and good for taking photos. Parking is better than other places, but still limited. Overall a nice place for lunch or dinner. Will come again.
Delicious Chinese food. They have vip room for meeting or celebrating event. Affordable price. Easy parking if not in busy hour.
great food, not too crowdy place even on weekend
Very recommended place if you wanna conduct a meeting with your colleagues
Good place, tasty food. Mostly are Chinese cuisine.  Good place to eat with family

Good place,good food,
 good service
Tempat baru nya enak buat nongkrong. Always great food with better place and view

Buka makan Suki & Bbqan gitu enak kali yaaa.
Pas banget lagi ada promo Ramadhan juga, paket suki udah dapet nasi dan teh botol juga cuma 40k aja. Selain murah, rasanya juga enak, apalagi bbqnya, gak abal-abal loh gaes. Paket Meat Lovers Couple cuma 70k aja. Untuk sauce, sambel dan cutlerynya bisa self service.

Tempatnya macem Foodcourt gitu, tersedia berbagai tenant makanan dan minuman. Nah si Cuisine Momoji ada di dalemnya, jadi masuk aja haha. Tempatnya lumayan luas, anti ngantri ngantri club!

Kuy cobain!

Tempat ny sepi pdhl ada di lokasi strategis, sepertinya masih baru makanya belum terlalu rame. Cocok buat yg gk terlalu suka tempat yg rame banyak orang. Rasa lumayan lah, tapi porsi banyak banget. Cocok buat perut karet, dompet blangsak, yg lebih mengutamakan perut kenyang drpd rasa. Cocok buat nongkrong2 jg krn lokasi ada di dago.
keren
Mantap
This is the right food for a family that wants to eat seafood here because the food here is quite delicious

the taste generally is good, but the kangkung is not fresh like its been in fridge forever, when they cooked it the leaves transform into a porridge shape & makes the sauce turned out greenish ; the Pare is good but both menus are too greasy, I was wondering why dont you guys use less cooking oil? it could be beneficial for cutting the cost production even just a bit. tofu dish I love it..
Good place to eat. The food was pretty good.
Good food cozy place
delicious and serve fresh food, good service and clean table desk.
My favorite cakery ever. I love their rolled cake
My favourite bakery store and taart since my childhood in Bandung. Always buy Africaantjes, nougat rhum roll, picnic rollbeef and tape molen 😘 Please stay your specialty: rhum!

The best traditional cakes and pastries shop in Bandung. The cakes are unique and unlike anything I've eaten before. Try the cakes with liquor layers, amazing!! 

More reviews, follow me on IG: @zanthrea.

This is my favourite bakery shop! Love the cakes! Mocca tart, lapis legit, bolu gulung, etc. Also their chocolade wafel! 
It's delicious!
Fantastic place. Very clean, good quality products.

A lot of choices, affordable price. a good place to buy a cake wet and dry. popular bakery shop for traveler & tourist. there are variety of cakes, pastry, snacks, etc. The favourite is The pisang molen (banana pastry).

This "pioniring place" large, mixed traditional-modern cakes & cookies keeps its popularity despite its location which is a bit deep inside into packed housing where the one size APV small road is the only way to get into it.

Legendary bakery in bandung, their speciality is bolen, a pastry with slice of banana with cheese or cheese+chocolate for filing. Delicious, famous gift from bandung. The cheese roll is also recomended

A very good place where you can buy bolen and others there. The place is big enough with a lot of choices of snack to buy. Unfortunately, the road from the main road to the shop is small. It is for one car only.
A lot of item dont have price tag,you should ask to the witers to know it...and after know it i regret it😂😂😂it so unfit with my pocket,for me it is the most expensive snacks ever😂😂😂
Old world ambience. Nice decor which reminds me of the 50s in Singapore. Serves a variety of local food as well as cakes etc.

Ice cream is delicious but need more attention for topping, for example the pineapple was sour, coffe in ice cream was hot which will speed up the melting process of the ice cream. Ambience is good for family and price is very reasonable. Many people ordered food here which looks and smells so delicious, unfortunately we were already full when we were there so we just ordered ice cream.

This place is my wife's favourite place and also my first pick to bring the company's guest. They've been serving since I was young👍
Delicious food, great ambience, nice serving with reasonable prices as well. Highly recommended!
Legendary places since i was in university, Nice Ice Cream soft and delicious, laksa also good taste
Just come, there are alot tasteful menu you must try..always crowded...but you will know what the reasons is..
Old fashioned hotel. But the room with king bed is spacious. Breakfast mostly Indonesian food. Location in the city centre, near the Asia Africa museum

One of my favorite hotel while staying in bandung is Prama Grand Preanger Bandung. 
Prama Grand Preanger feels like home. 

This hotel  which has a typical colonial style architectural style. Hotel located on Asia Afrika street no. 81 has been established since 1920.

Prama Grand Preanger has plenty of access to various tourism objects in the flower city such as trips to the train station (10 minutes), Husein Sastranegara Airport (15 minutes), just a short walk to the Asian square and Museum Africa. 

Check-in service can be said to be easy and fast so you can directly enter the room by chance we want two rooms that have connecting doors, the service is also friendly.

Their swimming pool are best, very clean and they have pool for kids also. 

Overall their service and hospitally was the main reason why we always comeback. 
Keep up the good work Prama Grand Preanger.

5star hotel. But consider old bulding and not really good maintained. Cleaning to be improved.

Location is perfect.
Perfect location, truly city centre. Good bfast, good hotel lobby, good staff. Historical renovated building but not the rooms. Old room, old matrass, dark shower chamber.
nice hotel, strategic location, 1-2 km from Braga street. recommended hotel
